SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.view

Interface ViewInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CliView, GUIView
public interface ViewInterface
ViewInterface defines methods for updating the client-side view in response to game events. This includes drawing various game elements, displaying notifications, and handling chat messages.

  • Method Details

    • drawScene

      void drawScene(SceneType sceneType)
      Draws the specified scene.
      Parameters:
      sceneType - the type of scene to draw.

    • drawBoard

      void drawBoard(PlayableCard[][] playableCards)
      Draws the game board with the provided playable cards.
      Parameters:
      playableCards - a 2D array representing the playable cards on the board.

    • drawHand

      void drawHand(ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand)
      Draws the player's hand with the provided resource cards.
      Parameters:
      hand - an ArrayList of ResourceCard representing the player's hand.

    • drawObjective

      void drawObjective(ObjectiveCard o)
      Draws the objective card.
      Parameters:
      o - the ObjectiveCard to draw.

    • drawStarting

      void drawStarting(StartingCard startingCard)
      Draws the starting card.
      Parameters:
      startingCard - the StartingCard to draw.

    • drawTable

      void drawTable(Map<String,Integer> playerPoints, ResourceCard resourceDeck, ResourceCard goldDeck, ResourceCard card0, ResourceCard card1, ResourceCard card2, ResourceCard card3)
      Draws the game table with the provided player points and resource cards.
      Parameters:
      playerPoints - a map of player names to their points.
      resourceDeck - the top card of the resource deck.
      goldDeck - the top card of the gold deck.
      card0 - the first card on the table.
      card1 - the second card on the table.
      card2 - the third card on the table.
      card3 - the fourth card on the table.

    • drawAvailableColors

      void drawAvailableColors(ArrayList<Color> colors)
      Draws the available colors for player selection.
      Parameters:
      colors - an ArrayList of available colors.

    • notifyJoinedPlayer

      void notifyJoinedPlayer(String joinedPlayer)
      Notifies that a player has joined the game.
      Parameters:
      joinedPlayer - the nickname of the joined player.

    • notifyWinners

      void notifyWinners(ArrayList<String> winners)
      Notifies the winners of the game.
      Parameters:
      winners - an ArrayList of the winners' nicknames.

    • notifyTurnOrder

      void notifyTurnOrder(ArrayList<String> order, String player)
      Notifies the turn order of the players.
      Parameters:
      order - an ArrayList of the players' nicknames in turn order.
      player - the nickname of the current player.

    • notifyCurrentPlayer

      void notifyCurrentPlayer(String current, Map<String,PlayableCard[][]> boards, String player, ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand, State gamestate)
      Notifies the current player and updates the game state.
      Parameters:
      current - the nickname of the current player.
      boards - a map of player names to their board states.
      player - the nickname of the player.
      hand - an ArrayList of the player's hand cards.
      gamestate - the current game state.

    • notifyCrashedPlayer

      void notifyCrashedPlayer(String username)
      Notifies that a player has crashed.
      Parameters:
      username - the nickname of the crashed player.

    • notifyChangeState

      void notifyChangeState(State gameState)
      Notifies a change in the game state.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the new game state.

      void notifyRejoinedPlayer(String rejoinedPlayer)
      Notifies that a player has rejoined the game.
      Parameters:
      rejoinedPlayer - the nickname of the rejoined player.

      void notifyChangePlayerBoard(String player, String nickname, Map<String,PlayableCard[][]> boards)
      Notifies a change in a player's board state.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player whose board changed.
      nickname - the nickname of the player.
      boards - a map of player names to their board states.

      o2 - the second ObjectiveCard.

    • updateCommonTable

      Updates the common table with player points and resource cards.
      Parameters:
      points - a map of player names to their points.
      topResDeck - the top card of the resource deck.
      topGoldDeck - the top card of the gold deck.
      tableCard1 - the first card on the table.
      tableCard2 - the second card on the table.
      tableCard3 - the third card on the table.
      tableCard4 - the fourth card on the table.

      Notifies the final colors chosen by the players.
      Parameters:
      colors - a map of player names to their chosen colors.
      players - an ArrayList of the players' nicknames.

    • drawFinalColors

      void drawFinalColors(Map<String,Color> colors, ArrayList<String> players)
      Draws the final colors chosen by the players.
      Parameters:
      colors - a map of player names to their chosen colors.
      players - an ArrayList of the players' nicknames.

    • UpdateCrashedPlayer

      void UpdateCrashedPlayer(String nickname, String player, State gameState, ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard, Map<String,PlayableCard[][]> boards, Map<String,Integer> points, ArrayList<String> players, ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> objectiveCards, Color color, ArrayList<ResourceCard> table)
      Updates the state of a crashed player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the crashed player.
      player - the nickname of the current player.
      gameState - the current game state.
      hand - an ArrayList of the player's hand cards.
      objectiveCard - the player's objective card.
      boards - a map of player names to their board states.
      points - a map of player names to their points.
      players - an ArrayList of the players' nicknames.
      objectiveCards - an ArrayList of the player's objective cards.
      color - the player's color.
      table - an ArrayList of the resource cards on the table.

    • UpdateFirst

      void UpdateFirst(Map<String,Integer> points, ArrayList<ResourceCard> commons)
      Updates the initial state of the game.
      Parameters:
      points - a map of player names to their points.
      commons - an ArrayList of common resource cards.

      void addGroupText(ArrayList<Text> chat, String player)
      Adds a group chat message.
      Parameters:
      chat - an ArrayList of Text messages in the chat.
      player - the nickname of the player sending the message.

    • drawChat

      void drawChat(ArrayList<Text> chat, String player)
      Draws the chat with the provided messages.
      Parameters:
      chat - an ArrayList of Text messages in the chat.
      player - the nickname of the player viewing the chat.

    • drawError

      void drawError(String message)
      Draws an error message.
      Parameters:
      message - the error message to draw.

    • restoreChat

      void restoreChat(ArrayList<Text> chat, String player)
      Restores the chat with the provided messages.
      Parameters:
      chat - an ArrayList of Text messages in the chat.
      player - the nickname of the player viewing the chat.

      Confirms that a player has joined the game.
